Articles.Content: Would it be possible to make a damage mod that might allow parts that have liquid fuel as a resource to 'catch on fire' when overheated, instead of just merely exploding? (This would be perhaps useful in conjunction with BDArmory)

6 minutes ago, TheSpaceManiac said:

Would it be possible to make a damage mod that might allow parts that have liquid fuel as a resource to 'catch on fire' when overheated, instead of just merely exploding? (This would be perhaps useful in conjunction with BDArmory)

That would be very interesting.  I know that one of the naval packs has something similar.
I think Skillful does, but its system only works for its own weapons.
